sentences.sContent: The proposed "megacity" will be 82,000 square miles --roughly the size of Utah.
sentences.sContent_eng: The proposed "megacity" will be 82,000 square miles --roughly the size of Utah.
sentences.sCn: 这个提议中的“巨型城市”面积将达到82000平方英里，相当于犹他州的面积。

sentences.sContent: As a personal preference, would you like to live in a megacity or a smaller city/town? Why?
sentences.sContent_eng: As a personal preference, would you like to live in a megacity or a smaller city/town? Why?
sentences.sCn: 以个人观点，您喜欢生活在大都市，还是小城市/城镇?为什么犫。

remMethod.val: mega(巨大的) + city(城市) → 大城市

trans.tranOther: a city with over 10 million inhabitants (
